imdb.plot outline: Series of 13 episodes of interviews hosted by José; Trajano, a journalist who has traveled through major Brazilian media outlets and who, after living in São Paulo for some decades, has the chance to rediscover his roots in Rio and, at the same time, surround himself with expensive things and subjects in his affective universe.
imdb.title: Bonde do Zé
plot: Series of 13 episodes of interviews hosted by José; Trajano, a journalist who has traveled through major Brazilian media outlets and who, after living in São Paulo for some decades, has the chance to rediscover his roots in Rio and, at the same time, surround himself with expensive things and subjects in his affective universe.
